subSections.title: Glyph origin
subSections.text:
{{Han etym}}
{{liushu|p}}: a hand with a weapon-like object ({{zh-l|*殳}}) - presumably a mallet - preparing to strike a hanging percussion instrument ({{zh-l|*壳}}).

subSections.title: Pronunciation
subSections.text:
{{zh-pron
|m=ké,qiào,què,er=y
|m_note=ké - colloquial; qiào - literary; ​què - literary (rare in Mainland)
|c=hok3
|h=pfs=hok
|mn=khak/khok
|mn_note=khak - vernacular, khok - literary
|mn-t=kag4
|w=4khoq
|mc=y
|oc=y
|ma=y
|cat=n
}}
